flawed_nl_solution:
1 hour is 60 minutes so 3 hours is 3*60 = <<3*60=108>>108 minutes
Three-quarters of 108 minutes is (3/4)*108 = <<(3/4)*108=81>>81 minutes
He spends 15 minutes on 1 page so he will spend 81 minutes on 81/15 = <<81/15=27/5>>27/5 pages

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 180, not 108. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
